div.p: This case-sensitive code system https://voicecollab.ai/fhir/CodeSystem/dsm5-q5 defines the following codes:

tr.td: I have not been more active (either socially, sexually, at work, home, or school) than usual.
I have occasionally been more active than usual.
I have often been more active than usual
I have frequently been more active than usual.
I am constantly more active or on the go all the time.

description.value: The codes required for dsm5 q5 questionnaire

display.value: I have not been more active (either socially, sexually, at work, home, or school) than usual.
I have occasionally been more active than usual.
I have often been more active than usual
I have frequently been more active than usual.
I am constantly more active or on the go all the time.
